overview: MLA Mani: Patham Classum Gusthiyum is a Malayalam film released in 2012. It was directed by Sreejith Paleri and had Kalabhavan Mani, Lena and Vidya in the lead roles.[1] Kalabhavan Mani has also done the music and has sung all the songs in the film.
title: MLA Mani: Patham Classum Gusthiyum
